MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry, and resident of the incubator "The Fintech House of Portugal".

Course Full Description and Welcome Letter:

Hello!


Welcome to the online course on women's leadership. This course is intended for everyone, especially for women who want to learn about the origins of feminism and women's leadership, about gender issues, myths about women's leadership, as well as about the barriers that almost every woman faces on her career path.


The course consists of theoretical, historical and statistical data, and also offers tools for leadership in a woman's life based on clear numbers and methods.


This course is useful not only for women, but also for company owners, managers and directors, because it provides recommendations for maintaining a work-life balance of employees.


The aim of the course is to inspire women and show them a lot of what they are capable of and what they can do if they believe in themselves and their abilities.


A little about me


My name is Zhansaya, but for you I'm just Saya


For the last 10 years, I have been teaching adults and children leadership, communication, conflict management, decision-making, planning - all the flexible skills necessary for life and work.


For 3 years I have been the regional coordinator of the republican leadership development project and work closely with women who study leadership.


In addition, I am a wife and mother of a newborn. Higher economic education in the field of marketing and management helps me to lead not only as a life skill, but also as a professional. All these skills and knowledge help me to manage my life, make it more effective and live not only for the family, but for myself too.


I hope that the course will be useful and effective for you, and inspire you to become the very best version of yourself.

courseDetails.title: Life Coaching Certification (ICF) 3-in-1: ACC, MCC and PCC
courseDetails.shortDescription: Your 3-in-1 Journey to ACC, PCC, and MCC Certification Greatness: Master Skills, Build Confidence, Transform Lives!
courseDetails.longDescription:
Imagine standing in front of a room filled with people whose lives you’ve transformed. Each one has a unique story, a breakthrough moment, and a journey of growth that started with your coaching. They look at you not just as a coach, but as the guide who helped them uncover their potential and take charge of their future. This could be your reality. But to get there, you need the skills, the confidence, and the credentials that set you apart as a professional life coach.

This is your story, and it begins here.

The Call to Adventure

Every hero starts as an ordinary individual with an extraordinary dream. You’ve always felt a pull to make a difference in people’s lives. Maybe you’re the one friends turn to for advice. Perhaps you’ve experienced transformative growth yourself and want to help others do the same. Or you’re already a coach who knows there’s a next level to reach—a mastery of skills and techniques that will make you unstoppable.

But here’s the catch: the journey to becoming a truly impactful life coach isn’t easy. You need to understand how to build trust, ask powerful questions, and create lasting change for your clients. And if you want to be recognized as a professional, the International Coaching Federation (ICF) credentials—ACC, PCC, and MCC—are non-negotiable.

This is where your path to mastery begins.

Your Mentor Appears

Every hero needs a guide, and this comprehensive 3-in-1 Life Coaching Certification Course is here to show you the way. Designed with aspiring and seasoned coaches in mind, this program takes you step-by-step through the journey of achieving the Associate Certified Coach (ACC), Professional Certified Coach (PCC), and Master Certified Coach (MCC) credentials.

We’ve distilled the essence of coaching mastery into a structured, actionable program. Think of it as your map for navigating the coaching world—one that ensures you avoid pitfalls and shortcuts your way to success.

Here’s what you’ll gain:

  1. The Skills of a Transformational Coach
    From understanding the ICF Core Competencies to mastering advanced communication and trust-building techniques, you’ll develop the skills to help clients unlock their potential and achieve their goals.

  2. The Confidence to Lead
    Coaching isn’t just about knowing the right questions to ask; it’s about embodying the mindset of a leader and guide. This course equips you with the tools to face any coaching challenge with confidence.

  3. The Credentials That Open Doors
    Whether you’re aiming for ACC, PCC, or MCC certification, this course prepares you to meet ICF’s rigorous standards. You’ll be ready to stand out in the competitive coaching industry.

Crossing the Threshold

As you begin this course, you’ll embark on a journey through expertly crafted lessons, practical exercises, and real-world scenarios. Here’s how it unfolds:

  • In the Beginning (ACC Level):
    You’ll start with the foundation of coaching. This is where you learn the essentials—how to establish trust, create clear agreements, and embody the mindset of a coach. These skills are the gateway to building meaningful client relationships.

  • Rising to the Challenge (PCC Level):
    At this stage, you’ll dive deeper. You’ll explore advanced techniques in communication, active listening, and fostering client growth. This is where you develop the expertise to navigate complex coaching scenarios and achieve powerful client breakthroughs.

  • Achieving Mastery (MCC Level):
    The final stage is about transformation—yours and your clients’. You’ll learn to work with high-level clients, tackle intricate coaching challenges, and create lasting impact. At this level, you become the mentor others look up to.

Overcoming Challenges

Like every hero, you’ll face challenges along the way. You might wonder:

  • "Do I have what it takes to become a certified coach?"

  • "Can I really help others while building a fulfilling career for myself?"

This course is designed to answer those doubts. With clear, actionable steps and support at every turn, you’ll move past uncertainty and into action.

You’ll also have the opportunity to practice what you learn through mock coaching sessions, real-world examples, and feedback loops. By the time you’re done, you won’t just feel ready—you’ll be ready to coach with confidence.

The Allies on Your Journey

You’re not in this alone. This course brings together a community of learners just like you, all working towards their coaching goals. You’ll share insights, celebrate milestones, and learn from each other’s experiences.

Additionally, our team of experts has designed the curriculum to ensure you’re always supported. Each lesson builds on the last, creating a seamless learning experience that keeps you engaged and motivated.

The Transformation

As you progress, you’ll notice a shift—not just in your skills, but in your mindset. You’ll start to see yourself not just as a learner, but as a coach. Someone who can inspire change, empower others, and lead with integrity.

Here’s what success looks like:

  • For Beginners: You’ll have a clear roadmap to earning your ACC certification and starting your coaching career.

  • For Experienced Coaches: You’ll refine your skills, achieve PCC or MCC certification, and position yourself as a leader in the industry.

  • For Leaders and Professionals: You’ll integrate coaching into your work, becoming a more effective leader and mentor.

The Return Home

Every hero’s journey ends with a return—but you won’t be the same person you were when you started. Armed with the knowledge, skills, and credentials from this course, you’ll be ready to make a lasting impact in the lives of your clients.

Your coaching practice will thrive, your confidence will soar, and you’ll stand out as a certified professional in a rapidly growing field.

The Invitation

This isn’t just a course—it’s your gateway to transformation. Not just for your clients, but for yourself.

So, are you ready to step into your story as a life coach? To move from dreaming to doing?

The world needs more guides, more mentors, more coaches like you. And it all starts here.

Enroll today and take the first step on your journey to becoming an ACC, PCC, or MCC-certified coach. Your story is waiting to be written.
targetAudiences: Aspiring Life Coaches: Individuals who are passionate about guiding others and want to start their journey by earning ICF’s Associate Certified Coach (ACC) credential
Practicing Coaches Advancing Their Credentials: Coaches ready to take their career to the next level by achieving Professional Certified Coach (PCC) or Master Certified Coach (MCC) status
Professionals Seeking Coaching Skills: Leaders, HR professionals, or mentors looking to incorporate coaching techniques into their work to foster growth and development in others
Experienced Coaches Pursuing Mastery: Coaches seeking to refine their practice, deepen their impact, and embody ICF’s highest coaching standards through the MCC credential

courseDetails.title: Sales Skills Guide: Basic Sales Techniques for Beginners
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master Essential Sales Techniques for Beginners: Build Rapport, Overcome Objections, and Close Deals with Confidence
courseDetails.longDescription:
Are you new to sales and eager to build a solid foundation for success? Or perhaps you're a small business owner or entrepreneur looking to sharpen your sales skills to drive growth and profitability? Whatever your goal, "Sales Skills Guide: Basic Sales Techniques for Beginners" is the course you've been waiting for!


This comprehensive course takes you step-by-step through the essential skills and techniques that every beginner salesperson needs to know. Whether you're working in retail, B2B sales, or as a freelancer, this course will teach you how to effectively engage with prospects, handle objections, and close deals with confidence.


In this course, you'll first learn about the sales process itself. We’ll break down each stage—from prospecting and qualifying to presenting your product, handling objections, and ultimately closing the deal. You'll learn the importance of building trust and rapport with your prospects and how to apply effective communication strategies to ensure you're always in sync with your customers' needs.


One of the most valuable lessons you'll take away from this course is learning how to handle objections. As a beginner, objections can feel like roadblocks, but with the right mindset and strategies, they become opportunities to build trust and move closer to a sale. We'll teach you how to reframe objections, respond with empathy, and find solutions that keep the conversation moving forward.


We also cover the crucial skill of tailoring your sales pitch. You’ll learn how to adjust your message to meet the unique needs and preferences of each prospect, whether you’re in-person, over the phone, or online. With these tailored strategies, you’ll be equipped to present your product or service as the best solution for the customer.


But sales doesn’t end with the close—long-term success comes from building strong relationships with your customers. In this course, you'll learn how to follow up effectively, keep customers satisfied, and generate repeat business. You’ll also discover how to turn your happy customers into loyal advocates, helping you grow your network and expand your opportunities.


By the end of this course, you’ll be equipped with the knowledge, tools, and confidence to succeed in any sales environment. Whether you're looking to break into sales, improve your current skills, or grow your business, this course will give you the practical techniques and strategies you need to make every sale count.


Enroll now to start your journey toward sales success!
targetAudiences: Aspiring Sales Professionals: Individuals who are new to the sales field and seeking to build a strong foundation in basic sales techniques to begin a career in sales or transition into a sales role in any industry

Small Business Owners and Entrepreneurs: Entrepreneurs and small business owners who want to develop their sales skills to effectively market their products or services, handle customer inquiries, and close sales to grow their businesses

courseDetails.title: Day Trading for Beginners: Fundamentals of Day Trading
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master Day Trading Strategies, Risk Management, and Market Psychology for Consistent Profits
courseDetails.longDescription:
Are you ready to take control of your financial future and learn the art of day trading? Whether you're a complete beginner or someone with some experience in the financial markets, this course is designed to help you understand the essential skills and strategies needed to succeed as a day trader. Day trading can be an exciting, profitable pursuit — but it’s also fast-paced, challenging, and requires discipline, focus, and a solid understanding of the market. This course will guide you step-by-step through the fundamentals, advanced techniques, and psychological aspects of day trading to help you navigate the world of short-term trading with confidence.


What you’ll learn in this course:


  • Master the Basics of Day Trading: You will gain a clear understanding of what day trading is, how it differs from long-term investing, and why it can offer profitable opportunities for those who know how to navigate the fast-moving markets. Learn how to analyze price movements, read market charts, and use key indicators to identify trading opportunities.

  • Develop Effective Trading Strategies: Trading without a plan is like driving without a map. In this course, we’ll show you how to develop a robust, repeatable trading strategy tailored to your goals. You'll learn how to use technical analysis tools like moving averages, RSI, and candlestick patterns to predict price movements and time your trades more accurately.

  • Learn Risk Management Techniques: One of the most important aspects of successful trading is risk management. In this course, you’ll learn how to assess risk, calculate position sizes, use stop-loss orders, and establish a risk-reward ratio that maximizes profits while minimizing potential losses. Whether you're managing a small account or trading larger sums, you'll discover the techniques that successful traders use to protect their capital.

  • Master the Psychology of Trading: Trading is not just about numbers and charts — it’s about mastering your emotions. In this course, we dive into the psychological side of trading and teach you how to overcome fear, greed, and impatience. Learn how to build a resilient mindset that will help you stay disciplined, focused, and calm under pressure. We’ll show you how to make logical decisions instead of emotional ones, which is a key to consistent success in trading.

  • Adapt to Different Market Conditions: Day traders must be able to adapt quickly to changing market conditions. You will learn how to spot bullish, bearish, and sideways market trends and adjust your strategy accordingly. Whether the market is trending up, down, or moving sideways, this course will teach you how to identify the right moments to trade and how to adjust your strategy to fit the prevailing conditions.

  • Build a Personal Trading Plan: You’ll walk away from this course with a customized trading plan that fits your personal risk tolerance, trading goals, and market interests. Learn how to assess your strengths and weaknesses as a trader and develop a plan that works for you.


Why choose this course?


This course is packed with practical insights, actionable strategies, and expert tips that can help you go from a beginner to a more confident, skilled day trader. With clear, easy-to-understand explanations and no need for advanced technical knowledge, you’ll learn the core principles of trading that you can immediately apply to your trading routine. Each module builds on the last, ensuring that you develop the knowledge and skills necessary to become a successful day trader.


Whether you aim to trade full-time, supplement your income, or simply learn more about the markets, this course will equip you with the tools and strategies to reach your goals. Through a combination of well-researched techniques, expert advice, and a strong focus on psychological readiness, you’ll be ready to take your trading to the next level.


Enroll now and start your journey toward financial independence by mastering the exciting world of day trading. Your path to success begins here!
targetAudiences: Beginner Traders with Little to No Experience: This group includes individuals who are new to financial markets and day trading. They are looking for a structured and comprehensive introduction to the world of day trading, with an emphasis on foundational concepts, strategies, and risk management

Aspiring Full-Time or Part-Time Traders: These learners have some prior knowledge of trading or investing but are interested in transitioning into day trading as a full-time or part-time career. They seek to deepen their understanding of day trading strategies, market analysis techniques, and the psychological aspects of trading to make more informed and profitable decisions

Investors Looking to Diversify into Active Trading: This group consists of experienced investors who may have primarily focused on long-term investments, such as stocks, bonds, or mutual funds. They are looking to diversify their portfolio by incorporating day trading into their investment strategy and wish to learn how to manage the faster-paced nature of day trading and minimize risks

courseDetails.title: دليل ChatGPT: كيفية كسب المال عبر الإنترنت باستخدام ChatGPT
courseDetails.shortDescription: اكتساب المهارات اللازمة لكسب المال عبر الإنترنت باستخدام ChatGPT: استراتيجيات الكتابة، التسويق، وتحليل البيانات
courseDetails.longDescription:
هل ترغب في معرفة كيف يمكن لأدوات الذكاء الاصطناعي الحديثة مثل ChatGPT أن تساعدك في كسب المال عبر الإنترنت؟ هذه الدورة هي فرصتك المثالية لاكتشاف كيفية استخدام هذه الأداة المذهلة لتحقيق النجاح المالي في عالم الإنترنت الواسع. مع ChatGPT، يمكنك تحسين مهاراتك في الكتابة، التسويق الرقمي، والتحليل البياني لتحقيق دخل مستدام والعمل بشكل أكثر كفاءة.


في هذه الدورة الشاملة، سنأخذك خطوة بخطوة عبر استراتيجيات مجربة وفعالة لاستخدام ChatGPT لتحقيق أهدافك المالية. سواء كنت مبتدئًا تمامًا في العمل عبر الإنترنت أو لديك خبرة سابقة وترغب في تحسين مهاراتك، ستجد في هذه الدورة كل ما تحتاجه لتبدأ وتنجح. سنغطي كل شيء بدءًا من الكتابة الجذابة، مرورًا بالاستراتيجيات التسويقية المتقدمة، وصولاً إلى تحسين محركات البحث (SEO) واستخدام ChatGPT لتحليل البيانات وزيادة الأداء.


ماذا ستتعلم في هذه الدورة؟


  • استخدام ChatGPT لكتابة محتوى جذاب وفعّال: تعلم كيفية إنتاج نصوص عالية الجودة في وقت قصير، سواء كانت مقالات، مدونات، أو نصوص تسويقية.

  • استراتيجيات التسويق بالعمولة: استكشف كيفية استخدام ChatGPT للترويج للمنتجات والخدمات عبر الإنترنت وكسب العمولات. تعلم كيف تختار المنتجات التي تناسب جمهورك وتكتب محتوى مميزًا يحفز المتابعين على الشراء.

  • تحسين محركات البحث (SEO): فهم كيفية تحسين ظهور محتواك على محركات البحث باستخدام ChatGPT. تعلم استراتيجيات البحث عن الكلمات الرئيسية وتحسين النصوص لتحقيق أفضل نتائج في البحث.

  • تحليل البيانات واستخدام الذكاء الاصطناعي لتحسين استراتيجيات العمل: تعلم كيف يمكن لـ ChatGPT مساعدتك في تحليل البيانات واستخلاص الأفكار الرئيسية التي يمكن أن تحسن من استراتيجياتك التجارية.

  • التسويق الرقمي وبناء العلامة التجارية: تعلم كيفية بناء وتوسيع علامتك التجارية عبر الإنترنت من خلال أدوات ChatGPT. ستتعلم كيف يمكنك التفاعل مع جمهورك، إنشاء محتوى ملهم وجذاب، وزيادة التفاعل والمبيعات.


لماذا يجب عليك الانضمام إلى هذه الدورة؟


  • دورة شاملة وسهلة المتابعة: ستتمكن من تعلم كيفية استخدام ChatGPT من الألف إلى الياء، بدءًا من الأساسيات وصولًا إلى الاستراتيجيات المتقدمة. ستكون قادرًا على تطبيق هذه المهارات في حياتك المهنية اليومية لتحقيق نتائج ملموسة.

  • فرص لا حصر لها: باستخدام ChatGPT، يمكنك فتح مجموعة من الفرص في الكتابة، التسويق، خدمة العملاء، وتحليل البيانات. ستتمكن من تحسين عملك الشخصي أو حتى بدء عمل تجاري جديد عبر الإنترنت.

courseDetails.title: Options Trading for Beginners: Learn the Basics of Trading
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master Options Trading: Learn Proven Strategies for Profit, Risk Management, and Market Analysis
courseDetails.longDescription:
Are you ready to take your trading to the next level? Unlock the power of options trading with this comprehensive, step-by-step course designed for both complete beginners and seasoned traders alike. Whether you're looking to generate income, hedge your investments, or speculate on market movements, this course will equip you with the skills and strategies you need to succeed in the exciting world of options.


Options trading is one of the most versatile tools in the financial markets, offering opportunities to profit in both rising and falling markets. However, without the right knowledge and strategies, options can be a risky venture. This course is designed to demystify options trading and provide you with a solid understanding of how to navigate the market with confidence and success.


Throughout this course, you’ll start with the basics, learning essential terminology and the mechanics of options contracts, including what calls and puts are, how they function, and why they provide an effective way to speculate on or hedge against market movements. From there, you’ll delve into a variety of trading strategies—from simple approaches like buying calls and puts to more advanced techniques like covered calls, straddles, and iron condors. These strategies will allow you to profit in different market conditions and adapt your trading to various risk profiles.


In addition to strategies, you’ll gain a deep understanding of the factors that affect options pricing. You’ll learn how volatility, time decay, interest rates, and the underlying asset’s price movements influence the value of options contracts. This knowledge will help you identify the best times to enter and exit trades, allowing you to optimize your trades and increase profitability.


Managing risk is one of the most crucial aspects of options trading, and in this course, we’ll teach you how to mitigate risk using smart strategies. You’ll explore important concepts like risk-reward ratios, stop-loss orders, and position sizing to ensure you’re minimizing potential losses while maximizing your returns. We also cover how to adjust your positions when market conditions change and how to implement advanced risk management techniques to protect your portfolio.


By the end of this course, you’ll be able to:


  • Confidently navigate the world of options trading with a solid understanding of key concepts and terminology.

  • Use a variety of options strategies to generate income, speculate on price movements, and hedge your investments.

  • Understand how external factors such as implied volatility, interest rates, and time decay affect the pricing of options.

  • Manage risk effectively, using strategies like stop-loss orders and position sizing to safeguard your capital.

  • Analyze market conditions and make informed, data-driven decisions about when to buy, sell, or hold options contracts.


This course is perfect for anyone interested in options trading, whether you’re a complete beginner or an experienced trader looking to expand your skill set. The lessons are broken down into easy-to-understand modules, with real-world examples and actionable insights to help you immediately apply what you’ve learned in the market.


Whether you're looking to start trading options or refine your existing skills, this course will provide you with the tools and knowledge to take control of your financial future. Don’t miss out on the opportunity to master options trading—join today and start learning the strategies that successful traders use to grow their wealth!


Enroll now and take the first step towards mastering options trading, minimizing risk, and maximizing your profits.
targetAudiences: Aspiring Traders and Investors: Individuals who are new to trading or investing and are looking to expand their knowledge into options markets. These learners may have basic knowledge of stock trading and are interested in leveraging options to enhance their strategies for income generation, speculation, or risk management

Active Traders Seeking to Diversify Strategies: Experienced traders who are already familiar with stock or forex trading but want to incorporate options into their trading portfolios. These learners aim to explore more advanced strategies such as spreads, straddles, and covered calls to increase their potential for profit while managing risk

Financial Professionals and Advisors: Financial planners, portfolio managers, and other professionals who wish to deepen their understanding of options trading. These learners seek to broaden their skill set for advising clients on investment strategies, managing portfolios, or enhancing risk management tactics with options-based solutions

courseDetails.title: ChatGPT Guide: Using ChatGPT to Provide Customer Service
courseDetails.shortDescription: Mastering AI-Driven Customer Service: How to Use ChatGPT for Efficient, Scalable, and Personalized Support
courseDetails.longDescription:
In today’s fast-paced, digital world, delivering exceptional customer service is more important than ever. With the rise of AI technologies like ChatGPT, businesses now have the power to provide faster, more personalized, and highly efficient customer support — all while reducing costs and improving customer satisfaction. This course will teach you exactly how to harness the potential of ChatGPT to enhance your customer service operations and take your business to the next level.


Whether you're a customer service manager, a small business owner, or an aspiring support agent, this course is designed to provide you with the practical skills and hands-on experience needed to implement and optimize ChatGPT in your customer service strategy. You’ll go from understanding the basics of AI and natural language processing (NLP) to mastering advanced techniques that allow you to handle a variety of customer inquiries with ease.


Throughout the course, you will learn how to:


  • Integrate ChatGPT Across Multiple Platforms: Discover how to seamlessly embed ChatGPT into your website, messaging apps, social media channels, and CRM systems to provide 24/7, on-demand support that your customers will love. This course will show you how to ensure ChatGPT fits perfectly within your existing customer service framework.

  • Automate Routine Inquiries: Learn how to train ChatGPT to handle common customer questions and requests — from order tracking to product inquiries and technical support. By automating these repetitive tasks, you can free up your human agents to focus on more complex issues and provide quicker responses to customers.

  • Deliver Personalized Customer Interactions: ChatGPT’s ability to tailor responses based on customer data allows you to offer personalized experiences that increase customer satisfaction and loyalty. Learn how to use customer history, preferences, and contextual information to craft meaningful and relevant conversations.

  • Manage and Optimize ChatGPT’s Performance: Understand how to continuously improve ChatGPT’s accuracy and effectiveness by tracking interactions, analyzing customer feedback, and adjusting responses accordingly. We’ll cover how to regularly update and refine your AI model for maximum performance.

  • Handle Escalations and Ensure Smooth Handoffs: While ChatGPT can handle many customer inquiries, there will always be cases that require human intervention. This course will teach you how to identify when a customer issue should be escalated and ensure a smooth transition from ChatGPT to a human agent.

  • Scale Your Customer Service Efficiently: Learn how to leverage ChatGPT to scale your customer support operations without the need for additional staff. Whether you’re dealing with a high volume of inquiries or expanding to new time zones, ChatGPT allows your team to offer reliable support 24/7, meeting the growing needs of your business.


By the end of this course, you’ll have the knowledge and confidence to integrate ChatGPT into your customer service operations and create an AI-powered support system that helps you save time, improve efficiency, and provide a more seamless, personalized experience for your customers.


Why Should You Take This Course?


  • No Prior AI Knowledge Needed: This course is suitable for learners with no technical background. You’ll learn everything you need to know, step-by-step, to start using ChatGPT for customer service.

  • Actionable Strategies and Real-World Examples: We don’t just teach theory — we provide you with actionable strategies, practical tools, and real-world examples that you can implement immediately.

  • Industry-Relevant Skills: ChatGPT is quickly becoming an essential tool for businesses across industries, from e-commerce and retail to healthcare and finance. Learning how to use it will position you as a forward-thinking leader in customer service.


Who Is This Course For?


  • Customer Service Managers and Supervisors: Learn how to integrate and manage ChatGPT to enhance your team’s performance, improve customer satisfaction, and optimize your support workflow.

  • Small Business Owners and Entrepreneurs: Discover how to implement AI-driven customer support to provide efficient, cost-effective solutions for your business, even if you’re working with a small team.

  • Customer Support Agents and Technicians: Learn how to work alongside ChatGPT to enhance your own role in providing high-quality, responsive customer support and resolving complex issues.


What Will You Get from This Course?


  • Comprehensive Curriculum: Covering everything from AI basics to advanced deployment techniques, this course ensures that you gain in-depth knowledge of ChatGPT for customer service.

  • Practical, Instructor-Led Lessons: Engaging video lessons with real-world scenarios and tips from the instructor will guide you through every aspect of ChatGPT implementation.


In an increasingly competitive marketplace, providing exceptional customer support is a key differentiator. With ChatGPT, you can transform your customer service strategy, offering faster, smarter, and more personalized interactions that keep your customers happy and loyal.


Ready to upgrade your customer service? Enroll now and start using ChatGPT to deliver superior support, boost customer satisfaction, and scale your business today!

This group will benefit from learning how to integrate ChatGPT into their customer service strategies, manage performance, and optimize AI interactions to improve customer satisfaction and operational efficiency

courseDetails.title: Cold Email Guide: How to Write Effective Cold Emails

courseDetails.longDescription:
Are you ready to unlock the full potential of cold emailing and take your outreach to the next level? Cold emailing is one of the most powerful tools for connecting with potential clients, partners, and collaborators—but crafting an email that gets noticed, read, and responded to is a skill that requires strategy and finesse. Whether you're a sales professional, an entrepreneur, a marketer, or a freelancer, mastering cold emailing can be a game-changer in how you generate leads, expand your network, and grow your business. This course will teach you everything you need to know to write cold emails that not only get opened, but also drive results.


In this comprehensive course, you will learn step-by-step how to craft cold emails that grab attention, build rapport, and spark action. We’ll cover everything from writing compelling subject lines to structuring the body of your email for maximum impact. You’ll discover how to personalize your outreach to increase engagement, and how to create messages that resonate with your audience. With clear guidance and practical strategies, we’ll show you how to create cold emails that reflect professionalism and create opportunities.


The course delves into best practices for cold emailing, including how to avoid spam filters, stay clear of common pitfalls, and optimize your email list for higher deliverability rates. By learning how to track and analyze key email metrics like open rates, click-through rates, and response rates, you'll be able to measure your success and continuously improve your approach.


Throughout the course, you'll gain hands-on insights into creating effective cold emails for different purposes—whether you're looking to build relationships, generate leads, secure partnerships, or simply network with influential people in your industry. You’ll also see real-world examples and case studies of successful cold emails to help you visualize how these strategies work in practice.


By the end of this course, you will have the knowledge and confidence to write cold emails that get noticed, make an impact, and drive meaningful results. You’ll learn how to structure every email to maximize engagement, how to personalize your outreach to stand out from the competition, and how to refine your strategy to keep improving. Whether you’re new to cold emailing or looking to refine your skills, this course will give you the tools and techniques needed to succeed in one of the most important forms of digital communication today.


What you’ll learn:


  • The key components of an effective cold email and how to structure it for success.

  • How to craft attention-grabbing subject lines that increase your open rates.

  • Proven strategies for personalizing your emails to boost engagement and response.

  • The best practices for building your email list and improving deliverability.

  • How to avoid common mistakes that send cold emails straight to the spam folder.

  • Techniques for measuring the success of your cold emailing campaigns and optimizing your approach.

  • Real-world examples and case studies showing what works in cold email outreach.

  • How to overcome objections and write emails that lead to meaningful conversations.


This course is perfect for anyone looking to improve their cold emailing skills—whether you're in sales, marketing, business development, or just starting out in outreach. If you want to master the art of writing cold emails that stand out, engage, and drive responses, then this course is for you. Sign up today and start writing cold emails that get the results you deserve!

courseDetails.title: SMART Goals Parenting
courseDetails.shortDescription: 5 Skills to Parenting Healthier and Easier. Bye-Bye Power Struggles!
courseDetails.longDescription:
Many parents describe the desires for their children as "I want my kids to be happy" or "I want them to have a good life." But these goals are abstract and difficult to achieve once, let alone repeat. SMART Goals Parenting breaks these (and other) abstract desires down into their basic foundational components that allow you and your child to achieve happiness, connection, trust and respect... repeatedly.

SMART Goals Parenting's objective is to provide you with the knowledge and tools to cultivate your desired relationship with your child while also preparing your child for being able to one day cultivate happiness and success for him/herself. You will learn the two SMART goals, which will be your guiding lights are you traverse the terrain of parenthood. As long as you maintain your focus on what you are ultimately trying to achieve you won't get lost in the minutia.

After learning the SMART goals you will learn how to identify and avoid the pitfalls of choosing fear over love and discarding self-care. Engaging in these two behaviors will sabotage all of your work. It will be like pouring water into a bottle with no bottom. If you have ever felt unappreciated, unloved, disrespected or criticized for your parenting efforts then I am certain one or both of these barriers are at play.

The next few lessons will tackle guidance. My goal is to get you to the point when guiding your child is a simple conversation in which both of you feel understood and respected. Until then, you may need these skills to help you navigate. Choices, Consequences, Rewards and Reinforce are the four parts of seamless discipline. Streamline how you discipline and remove all power struggles. Doing so will solidify you as your child's respected figure and someone s/he can look up to.

The last, but not least topics covered are the most used parts of communication - listening and speaking. You should listen to understand and speak to build trust.
targetAudiences: Parents or caregivers of children aged 1 to 17 years old

courseDetails.title: QuickBooks Online (QBO) Bookkeeping With Bank Feeds
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn how to use bank feeds with QuickBooks Online QBO from a Certified Public Accountant CPA
courseDetails.longDescription:
This course is a project based course that will dive into bank feeds in detail using a step by step process.

We will start by setting up a free 30 day trial QuickBooks Online QBO file for the practice problem. Intuit, the owner of QuickBooks Online QBO, often offers a free 30 day trial period, a great tool for practice.

The course will demonstrate how to link QuickBooks Online QBO to the bank to receive bank data directly from the bank. We will also discuss the situations when you may want to download banking data from the bank and upload it to QuickBooks Online QBO.

Learners will follow along as we import bank data into the accounting software where it will be held in, what we call, Bank Feed Limbo, waiting for us to provide the added information necessary to use the data to create financial statements.

Learners will see how to add the bank data to the financial data in a step by step process, observing the creation of the balance sheet and profit and loss with each addition.

We will also discuss how to use bank rules to automate the process, benefiting future periods. As we enter data we will discuss best practices to make the data input as fast as possible and keep the financial statements as clean and readable as possible.
targetAudiences: Business owners
Accountants
Students

courseDetails.title: Product Flipping Guide: How to Make Money Reselling Products
courseDetails.shortDescription: How to Profit from Product Flipping: A Step-by-Step Guide to Sourcing, Selling, and Scaling Your Reselling Business
courseDetails.longDescription:
Are you looking for a way to earn money online and start your own business? Have you ever wondered how people make a profit by reselling products? If so, this course on Product Flipping is perfect for you!


In this comprehensive, step-by-step course, you will learn the art of flipping products—buying items at a low price and reselling them for a profit. Whether you’re interested in turning your passion for thrifting into a profitable side hustle or building a full-time business, this course will equip you with the knowledge, strategies, and tools you need to succeed in the world of reselling.


What is Product Flipping?


Product flipping involves finding undervalued items—whether at thrift stores, garage sales, or online marketplaces—purchasing them at a low price, and selling them for a higher price to make a profit. This simple concept has become a powerful way for individuals to generate income with minimal upfront investment. However, succeeding in product flipping requires a clear strategy, effective research methods, and the right tools to maximize your profits. That’s exactly what you’ll learn in this course.


What You'll Learn:


In this course, we’ll cover everything you need to know about flipping products. You’ll start by understanding the basic principles of product flipping and then dive deep into the specific strategies that successful flippers use to identify profitable products. You'll learn how to source items from various locations like thrift stores, online marketplaces, estate sales, and garage sales. We’ll walk you through how to properly evaluate the condition and authenticity of products, ensuring you buy high-quality items that will resell for a profit.


Once you’ve learned how to source products, we’ll teach you how to list them for sale. You'll discover how to create compelling, SEO-friendly product listings that stand out and attract buyers. We'll also explore the best platforms for selling, such as eBay, Amazon, and Facebook Marketplace, and help you choose the right platform based on the type of products you’re flipping.


But that’s not all. You’ll also learn key techniques for managing your inventory effectively, tracking your sales and profits, and scaling your flipping business. We’ll teach you how to automate certain aspects of your business to save time and grow faster. From crafting professional product descriptions to pricing items competitively, we’ll provide you with a solid framework to make your business more efficient and profitable.


In addition, we’ll cover how to stay motivated and persistent, even when you face challenges. You’ll learn how to handle customer inquiries, manage returns and refunds professionally, and communicate clearly to build trust and maintain a loyal customer base. courseDetails.title: QuickBooks Desktop Multiple Currencies
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn to record transactions using multiple currencies from a certified public accountant (CPA)
courseDetails.longDescription:
Learn how to get access to QuickBooks Desktop including a possible free 30-day trial version often offered by Intuit, the owner of QuickBooks Desktop.

The course will discuss accounting for multiple currencies, outlining the process in Excel to provide a more transparent look at the process. Then we will enter the transactions into QuickBooks, the software automating some of the steps required.

We will learn how to turn multicurrency on, and which accounts will be affected most by multicurrency transactions including cash account types, accounts receivable account types, and accounts payable account types.

Learners will work example problems related to the sales cycles and the purchases cycle, the sales cycle including foreign currency receivables, the purchases cycle including foreign currency payables.

We will also demonstrate transactions related to forward contracts, both for speculative purposes and to mitigate risk on foreign currency transactions.

The multiple currency feature is useful when the company is holding onto cash in a foreign currency, the software helping us to record the home currency equivalent for financial statement presentation.

Multiple currency functionality is also helpful when we make sales on account, sending an invoice, hoping to get paid in the future, tracking accounting receivable, but expecting to be paid in a foreign currency. The accounts receivable account will need to be valued in the home currency even though we will be paid in a foreign one.

We have a similar situation when we make purchases on account, promising to pay in a foreign currency at some point in the future. The accounts payable account will need to be valued in the home currency equivalence even though we will be paying in a foreign currency.
targetAudiences: Accountants
Bookkeepers
Business owners

courseDetails.title: Corporate Finance: Financial Analysis and Decision-Making
courseDetails.shortDescription: Unlocking Financial Insights for Informed Decision-Making and Valuation Strategies: An In-Depth Course
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to our comprehensive online course on corporate finance and financial statement analysis. In this course, we will provide an in-depth exploration of the key concepts and tools used in corporate finance.

We will start with an introduction to financial statements, covering the balance sheet, income statement, and cash flow statement. You will learn how to analyze these statements to assess a company's financial performance and make informed decisions.

Financial ratios will be a central focus of the course. We will delve into liquidity ratios, such as the current ratio and quick ratio, to evaluate a company's short-term solvency. Profitability ratios, including return on equity and gross margin, will help you assess a company's profitability. Additionally, we will explore leverage ratios, such as debt-to-equity ratio and interest coverage ratio, to gauge a company's financial risk.

Forecasting and budgeting are crucial skills in corporate finance. You will learn techniques to create financial forecasts and budgets, enabling you to anticipate future financial outcomes and plan for growth. We will discuss methods such as trend analysis, regression analysis, and the use of financial models to make reliable projections.

Leverage and break-even analysis will be covered extensively. You will understand the impact of debt and fixed costs on a company's profitability and risk. We will calculate and interpret various leverage ratios, such as the debt ratio and equity multiplier, and explore break-even analysis to determine the level of sales needed to cover costs.

Financing decisions are fundamental to corporate finance, and we will explore different sources of financing available to companies. You will learn about debt financing, equity financing, and the trade-offs between them. We will discuss the cost of capital and capital structure optimization to help you make optimal financing decisions.

Effective management of current assets is vital for maintaining liquidity and operational efficiency. Topics covered include working capital management, cash flow analysis, inventory management, and accounts receivable management. You will gain practical insights into techniques for optimizing current assets to support the company's financial health.

Short-term financing options, such as bank loans, lines of credit, and trade credit, will be explored in detail. You will understand the benefits and risks associated with different short-term borrowing options and how to assess their suitability for a company's financing needs.

The time value of money is a fundamental concept in finance, and we will cover it extensively. You will learn about present value, future value, annuities, and the calculation of interest rates. These skills will enable you to evaluate investment opportunities, project valuation, and capital budgeting decisions.

Valuation methods for bonds, common stock, and preferred stock will be thoroughly explained. We will discuss discounted cash flow analysis, dividend discount models, and price-earnings ratios to assess the intrinsic value of these securities. You will gain insights into the factors that influence the valuation of financial instruments.

Capital budgeting techniques, including net present value (NPV), internal rate of return (IRR), and payback period analysis, will be covered in detail. You will learn how to evaluate investment projects and make informed decisions based on their expected cash flows and profitability.

Managing investment risk is crucial, and we will explore techniques for measuring and managing risk. You will gain a deep understanding of portfolio theory, diversification strategies, and risk-adjusted return metrics to optimize your investment decisions.

The course will also delve into investment banking and the role of underwriters in capital markets. You will learn about the process of issuing securities, initial public offerings (IPOs), and the various functions of investment banks in facilitating capital raising activities.

Long-term debt financing, including bonds and loans, will be discussed extensively. We will cover debt valuation, debt covenants, and the impact of long-term debt on a company's capital structure. You will gain insights into the factors to consider when evaluating and structuring long-term debt financing.

Additionally, we will explore financing through common stock and preferred stock, dividend policy, convertible bonds, and warrants. You will understand the complexities associated with these financing instruments and their implications for a company's capital structure and shareholder value.

Finally, we will examine the dynamics of corporate acquisitions and the challenges posed by foreign currency. You will gain insights into the complexities of international finance, including exchange rate risk and the management of foreign currency transactions.

Throughout the course, you will have access to comprehensive case studies, practical exercises, and downloadable resources, including Excel files and reference materials, to reinforce your learning and provide hands-on experience in applying the concepts.

Enroll now in this comprehensive corporate finance course to enhance your financial analysis skills, decision-making abilities, and strategic insights, and gain a competitive edge in the dynamic world of corporate finance.
targetAudiences: Accounting professionals seeking to enhance their financial analysis skills.
Business owners and managers who want to make informed decisions based on financial statements.
Finance professionals and analysts looking to deepen their understanding of corporate finance.
Students pursuing a degree in accounting, finance, or business administration.
Individuals interested in learning how to analyze financial statements and make informed investment decisions.

courseDetails.title: Mastering price action trading in online trading
courseDetails.shortDescription: Price action trading with no indicators and no charts patterns. A unique way to be consistant in time.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Chartism, technical analysis and indicators are past due. Today´s traders must be one step ahead. The mainstream of knowledge in trading is still around the same algorithms and old school of the 80’ and 90’. The demands of the market today are currently beyond the reach of traders in years past. This course will get your trading to the next level so open yourself up to a new way of thinking. The journey to becoming a successful trader is not an easy one, but with patience and perseverance, it can be done. As you take this journey with me, remember that temperance and wisdom are essential components – they will help you make wise decisions in the market. With the right attitude and strategy, you can become both a successful and strategic trader.

    You can apply the price reading system in every instrument and also futures. The only requirement is that the asset must have a trading volume which is massive enough to have generated a market history. Without volume of transactions, the asset will have little activity and will not provide sufficient information. Many new instruments that go on the market do not yet have sufficient daily volume, and so price reading is not applicable. To conclude, it's important to remember the fundamentals of price action are supply and demand. Knowing how these two factors interplay is essential for traders who want to make informed decisions about when to buy and sell. While the market can be unpredictable, understanding price movements will help you build your trading strategy and potentially yield successful outcomes.

  The bottom line is that price action strategies can be applied to any asset, according to its history. Each asset has its own characteristics, so understanding the balance between supply and demand is key to success in the market. As a trader, it's important to analyze each asset's past performance and build an investment strategy around it. The more history one can bring into the equation, the better equipped they will be our entries with greater accuracy and expertise. After all, knowledge is power when it comes to investing.

  Price action equals market in action and that is behavior of buyers and sellers. While behaviorism does not provide any guarantees about the future, it can help us analyze the historical data that is available in order to better understand how our actions impact the financial market. By being aware of our behavior and recognizing patterns, we can become more effective and strategic in our decisions. As we continue to study this field, we may find even more ways for people to better understand their attitude towards, and reactions to, favorable or unfavorable market conditions.

  While price action may be complicated to understand at first, with practice it blends into the background and can become second nature. Unlike other strategies, price action does not use indicators for decision-making - but rather relies on your individual judgment of market opportunities at any given moment. The most important concept it is not only understand price action factor in trading, but also applying it with scalping techniques to maximize success. With patience and attention to detail, you can unlock tremendous profits by taking advantage of short-term price changes in the market.
targetAudiences: Traders lacking consistency in trading results over time

courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn to record transactions using multiple currencies from a certified public accountant (CPA)
courseDetails.longDescription:
Learn how to get access to QuickBooks Online including a possible free 30-day trial version often offered by Intuit, the owner of QuickBooks Online.

The course will discuss accounting for multiple currencies, outlining the process in Excel to provide a more transparent look at the process. Then we will enter the transactions into QuickBooks, the software automating some of the steps required.

We will learn how to turn multicurrency on, and which accounts will be affected most by multicurrency transactions including cash account types, accounts receivable account types, and accounts payable account types.

Learners will work example problems related to the sales cycles and the purchases cycle, the sales cycle including foreign currency receivables, the purchases cycle including foreign currency payables.

We will also demonstrate transactions related to forward contracts, both for speculative purposes and to mitigate risk on foreign currency transactions.

The multiple currency feature is useful when the company is holding onto cash in a foreign currency, the software helping us to record the home currency equivalent for financial statement presentation.

Multiple currency functionality is also helpful when we make sales on account, sending an invoice, hoping to get paid in the future, tracking accounting receivable, but expecting to be paid in a foreign currency. The accounts receivable account will need to be valued in the home currency even though we will be paid in a foreign one.

We have a similar situation when we make purchases on account, promising to pay in a foreign currency at some point in the future. The accounts payable account will need to be valued in the home currency equivalence even though we will be paying in a foreign currency.
targetAudiences: Business owners
Accountants
Bookkeepers

Product Owner Certification: Mastering the Art of Value Delivery in Scrum

Welcome to the Product Owner Certification, meticulously designed to elevate your understanding and application of the Scrum framework, specifically through the lens of a Product Owner. For Professionals: Enhance Your Agile Career

As a Product Owner or an individual aspiring to embrace this crucial role within Agile teams, this certification will benchmark your proficiency, enabling you to:

  • Showcase Your Expertise: Demonstrate your comprehensive grasp of the Scrum framework, making you a valuable asset in the Agile job market.

For Organizations: Optimize Your Scrum Teams

In today's dynamic landscape of technology and product development, Agile methodologies are the bedrock of successful and timely product delivery. Adopting Scrum can fundamentally transform Agile product management, fostering enhanced collaboration and superior product outcomes. By engaging in our Product Owner Certification Assessment, your organization can reap numerous benefits:

  • Assess Team Skills: Confirm that your Product Owners and team members have a robust understanding of Scrum practices and values.

  • Competitive Advantage: Distinguish your company in the realm of Agile product management by showcasing certified Product Owners, appealing to clients and projects that value certified expertise.


The Role of a Product Owner: Champion of Value Maximization

The Product Owner is a key player within Scrum teams, acting as the nexus between the customer, the development team, and the product itself. As a Product Owner, you are charged with:

  • Prioritizing Value Delivery Guide your team in delivering the highest value to customers by effectively managing and ordering the Product Backlog.

  • Facilitating Scrum Artifacts Collaborate with the Scrum Master and development team to ensure that Product Backlog items are well-understood, transparent, and actionable.

  • Navigating Complexity Tackle complex product challenges by fostering an environment that encourages innovation, rapid feedback, and iterative progress.

  • Mentoring and Leadership Empower your team to embrace Agile practices, promoting self-organization, and continuous growth in value delivery.


Why Choose Our Product Owner Certification Assessment?

Our assessment is thoughtfully crafted to reflect the comprehensive scope of the Scrum framework as per the Official Scrum Guide. What makes our Product Owner Certification Assessment stand out:

  • Real-World Application Our questions challenge you with scenarios that Product Owners frequently encounter, ensuring a practical understanding of the role.

  • Extensive Scope The assessment encompasses all critical aspects of the Product Owner role, from backlog management to stakeholder engagement, offering a thorough evaluation of your knowledge.

  • Immediate Insights Receive instant feedback on your performance, helping you to identify areas for further study or confirming your expertise.

  • Product Owner Certificate Successful candidates will receive a Product Owner Certificate issued by Agile Enterprise Coach, adding a tangible credential to your professional achievements.

Assessment Structure and Content

The Product Owner Certification Assessment consists of multiple-choice questions that span a wide array of topics, including but not limited to:

  • Scrum Theory and Empiricism

  • Product Owner Responsibilities and Accountabilities

  • Effective Product Backlog Management

  • Maximizing Value and ROI

  • Stakeholder Engagement and Communication

  • Understanding and Applying the Definition of Done


How to Get Certified

  1. Prepare Thoroughly: Study the Official Scrum Guide and familiarize yourself with the role of the Product Owner.

  2. Complete the Assessment: Answer the multiple-choice questions to the best of your ability.

  3. Submit Your Results: Send proof of your completed assessment to receive your Product Owner Certificate from our institution.

  4. Enhance Your Credentials: Display your certification on your CV and professional profiles to showcase your expertise.

courseDetails.shortDescription: The Tai Chi System: Forms, Walking, and Complete Practice
courseDetails.longDescription:
This course is your key to unlocking the secrets of Tai Chi, a traditional Chinese practice known for its gentle movements and incredible benefits. You'll start with the basics, learning the five essential Tai Chi warm-ups to prepare your body and mind for the journey ahead. Next, you'll master the 12 posture forms, the foundation of any Tai Chi practice. And it doesn't stop there – you'll also discover the power of Tai Chi walking and how it can supercharge your overall well-being. To round out your practice, you'll learn 10 energizing Qigong exercises and five soothing cool-down stretches.

Tai Chi isn't just about physical fitness, though. It's also a journey of self-discovery and inner peace. Through consistent practice, you'll develop better balance, flexibility, and focus. You'll also learn techniques for managing stress and promoting a sense of calm and well-being.

This course is designed for all levels, from beginners to those with more experience. Whether you're looking to improve your physical health, reduce stress, or simply discover a new way to move your body, you'll find value in this course. You'll learn at your own pace.

There's no need for special equipment or a large space. You can practice Tai Chi anywhere, anytime. So why wait? Start your Tai Chi journey today and experience the many benefits of this ancient practice for yourself.
targetAudiences: A busy professional who wants to learn some quick and easy way to de-stress and re-energize.
Beginners who have an interest in Tai Chi and wants to try it for the first time.
someone who's recovering from an injury and needs a low-impact exercise to help them heal and regain their strength and flexibility
Someone who's just starting to get into fitness and wants to try something new tat's gentle on their body.
Seniors who want to improve balance, flexibility, and reduce stress.
Someone who wants to improve their posture and balance to help prevent falls.

Enroll today and take the first step toward becoming a certified expert in Customer Service Management. Join now and turn customer interactions into lasting relationships!
